argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dfur2.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | dfur2.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | dfur2.u | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 5 | 4, 1 | #P_mgpbas | |- B = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 2 | #P_mgpplusg | |- .x. = ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 3 | #P_ringidval | |- .1. = ( 0g ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_grpidval | |- .1. = ( iota e ( e e. B /\ A. x e. B ( ( e .x. x ) = x /\ ( x .x. e ) = x ) ) ) |
